title: Message from the Mayor | Financial Assistance Program (Canterbury City Council)
text: ( Source : Canterbury City Council ) Released on 5 October 2015 The City of Canterbury is lucky to have many community groups who are dedicated to working for local residents and families. When times are tough they are even more important, as
